00020    /* 
00021    * Constructor.
00022    */
00023    SlitExternal::SlitExternal() 
00024     : boundaryPtr_(0),
00025       nAtomType_(0),
00026       isInitialized_(false)
00027    {}
00028    
00029    /* 
00030    * Copy constructor.
00031    */
00032    SlitExternal::SlitExternal(const SlitExternal& other)
00033     : epsilon_(other.epsilon_),
00034       sigma_(other.sigma_),
00035       sigmaCb_(other.sigmaCb_),
00036       cutoff_(other.cutoff_),
00037       coeff_(other.coeff_),
00038       boundaryPtr_(other.boundaryPtr_),
00039       nAtomType_(other.nAtomType_),
00040       isInitialized_(other.isInitialized_)
00041    {}
00042    
00043    /* 
00044    * Assignment operator.
00045    */
00046    SlitExternal& SlitExternal::operator = (const SlitExternal& other)
00047    {
00048       boundaryPtr_   = other.boundaryPtr_;
00049       nAtomType_     = other.nAtomType_;
00050       isInitialized_ = other.isInitialized_;
00051       epsilon_       = other.epsilon_;
00052       sigma_         = other.sigma_;
00053       sigmaCb_       = other.sigmaCb_;
00054       cutoff_        = other.cutoff_;
00055       coeff_         = other.coeff_;
00056       return *this;
00057    }
00058 
00059    /* 
00060    * Set nAtomType
00061    */
00062    void SlitExternal::setNAtomType(int nAtomType) 
00063    {  
00064       if (nAtomType <= 0) {
00065          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType <= 0");
00066       }
00067       if (nAtomType > MaxAtomType) {
00068          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > SlitExternal::MaxAtomType");
00069       }
00070       nAtomType_ = nAtomType;
00071    }
00072 
00073    /* 
00074    * Set pointer to the Boundary.
00075    */
00076    void SlitExternal::setBoundary(Boundary &boundary)
00077    {  boundaryPtr_ = &boundary; }
00078    
00082    void SlitExternal::setExternalParameter(double externalParameter)
00083    {
00084       // Preconditions
00085       if (!isInitialized_) {
00086          UTIL_THROW("SlitExternal potential is not initialized");
00087       }
00088 
00089       epsilon_ = externalParameter;
00090    }
00091 
00092    /* 
00093    * Read potential parameters from file.
00094    */
00095    void SlitExternal::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00096    {
00097       if (nAtomType_ == 0) {
00098          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType must be set before readParam");
00099       }
00100       if (!boundaryPtr_) {
00101          UTIL_THROW("Boundary must be set before readParam");
00102       }
00103    
00104       // Read parameters
00105       // readBegin(in,  "SlitExternal");
00106       read<double>(in, "epsilon", epsilon_);
00107       read<double>(in, "sigma", sigma_);
00108       read<double>(in, "cutoff", cutoff_);
00109       // readEnd(in);
00110 
00111       // Initialize dependent variables (particle number density = 0.7)
00112       sigmaCb_ = sigma_ * sigma_ * sigma_;
00113       coeff_   = 4.0 * epsilon_ * acos(-1.0) / 45.0 * 0.7 * sigmaCb_;
00114 
00115       isInitialized_ = true;
00116    }
00117 
00121    double SlitExternal::externalParameter() const
00122    {
00123      return epsilon_;
00124    }
00125 
00129    std::string SlitExternal::className() const
00130    {  return std::string("SlitExternal"); }
00131  
00132 }
